column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had a team dinner here and the food and service was excellent! I had heard great things about the cuisine prior to coming so I had high expectations
column2: and I'd say they solidly delivered. My coworkers were all pleased with their steaks
column3: there was an abundance of delicious savory sides
column4: and I was a fan of the salmon dish! Overall
column5: the brussel sprouts were probably the best dish we ordered
column6: as they were super flavorful without being too salty.
